channel.title: Pendleton-John Day Highway on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Pendleton-John Day Highway on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: East Main St. at US-395/OR-402 in Long Creek
item.description: East Main St. at US-395/OR-402 in Long Creek. Turn left for US-395 north to Ukiah and Pendleton. Turn left for US-395 south to Fox and John Day.

item.title: US-395 South at OR-402 West
item.description: US-395 south at OR-402 west to Hamilton, Monument, and Kimberly. Turn left for forest road east to Galena on the Middle Fork John Day River.

item.title: US-395 South - Mile 90 B
item.description: Milepost 90 (B) on US-395 south. The B is because the state of Oregon maintains different internal highways along the state highway system. Some of the signed highways (like US-395) span multiple internal highways. In this case this is the second internal highway south from the Washington border that belongs only to US-395. The first (Umatilla-Stanfield #54) is marked as an A on mileposts. This is the second (B) stretch - Pendleton - John Day #28).

item.title: US-395 South Approaching OR-402
item.description: US-395 South approaching OR-402 in Long Creek. Use OR-402 west for Monument and Kimberly.

item.title: US-395 South - Entering Long Creek
item.description: Entering Long Creek on US-395 south.

item.title: US-395 South - Ritter Butte Summit
item.description: US-395 South - Summit Ritter Butte - Elevation 3993 Feet.

item.title: Middle Fork John Day River Road at US-395
item.description: Middle Fork John Day River Road at US-395 in Grant County. Turn left for US-395 south to Long Creek; left for US-395 north to Ukiah.

item.title: US-395 South at OR-74
item.description: US-395 south at OR-74. Turn right for OR-74 west to Heppner and Condon. Merge left for US-395 south to Ukiah and John Day.

item.title: US-395 Jct. at Battle Mountain State Park
item.description: US-395 junction at Battle Mountain State Park entrance road. Turn right for US-395 south to Ukiah; left for US-395 north to Pilot Rock.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 209
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 209 - US-395 South/Pendleton/John Day. US-395 joins I-84 west to Stansfield.

item.title: US-395 North Approaching I-84
item.description: US-395 north approaching I-84. Use left lane for I-84 West/US-395 North to Pasco and Spokane (both in Washington via US-395).

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 209
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 208 - US-395 South/OR-37/Pendleton/John Day. US-395 joins I-84 west to Stanfield, Oregon.

item.title: US-30 East to US-395 South - Pendleton
item.description: US-30 east at Court St. - To US-395 South/John Day/Pilot Rock. Continue east on US-30 for (Pendleton) City Center and (I-84) Freeway East.

item.title: I-84 West Exit 209
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 209, US-395 South/OR-37/Pendleton/John Day.

item.title: US-26 West at US-395 North
item.description: US-26 West/US-395 North at US-395 north to Long Creek and Pendleton.

item.title: US-26 West at US-395 North
item.description: US-26 West/US-395 North approaching US-395 north.

item.title: US-26 East approaching US-395 North
item.description: US-26 east approaching US-395 north to Long Creek and Pendleton, 1/2 mile.

item.title: US-26 East at US-395 North
item.description: US-26 east approaching US-395 north. US-395 follows US-26 east to John Day.

item.title: US-26 East at US-395 North
item.description: US-26 east at US-395 north to Long Creek and Pendleton, and US-26 east/US-395 south to John Day and Burns.
